thread.title: KU basketball's Dwight Coleby has ACL tear, Bill Self says
thread.title_full: KU basketball's Dwight Coleby has ACL tear, Bill Self says

author: The Capital-Journal
title: KU basketball's Dwight Coleby has ACL tear, Bill Self says
text:
KU basketball's Dwight Coleby has ACL tear, Bill Self says Coleby transferred from Ole Miss Posted: October 1, 2015 - 3:17pm By The Capital-Journal 
Junior transfer forward Dwight Coleby will miss out on practicing during the 2015-2016 season after suffering a torn ACL in his left knee, Kansas coach Bill Self announced Wednesday in a news release. Coleby would have had to sit out the season under NCAA transfer rules. 
The release said the injury occurred Friday during a “light team workout,” and Coleby will have surgery the week of Oct. 11. 
Coleby transferred from Ole Miss, where he played in all 34 games in the 2014-15 season and averaged 5.4 points, 4.8 rebounds and 16.5 minutes.
